column2: Start with Catholicism and Orthodoxy separated from each other.
Start with Catholicism and Orthodoxy united together.\n§ROnly works with timelines before 1054§!
Disables vampires, werewolves, devil worshippers, shapeshifters, and wizards.
Enables vampires, werewolves, devil worshippers, shapeshifters, and wizards.
Enables ambient sounds based on the location of your character.\n§ROnly works well while playing on speed 1§!
